name: Cream Corn Like No Other
briefdescription: Creamed corn made from scratch beats any canned variety! A rich, creamy sauce with Parmesan cheese turns frozen corn kernels into something extraordinary.

ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen corn kernels, thawed
0.25 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste
0.25 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste

instructions: Combine corn, heavy cream, sugar, butter, salt, and pepper in a skillet over medium heat. Cook, stirring occasionally, until butter has melted, 3 to 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, whisk together milk and flour in a small bowl until smooth.
Add milk mixture to the skillet and continue to cook, stirring constantly, until sauce is thickened and corn is cooked through, about 4 minutes.
Remove from the heat, and stir in Parmesan cheese until melted. Serve hot.

comments.comment: Sorry folks but this is GREAT!! I added some chopped jalapenos and minced onion. Not sure how anyone doesn't like this. Thank you.
